scripts.compile:all.sh: npm run install:all && npm run start:all.sh
scripts.compile:all.bat: npm run install:all && npm run start:all.bat
scripts.install:all: npm i && concurrently npm:install:common-front && concurrently npm:install:fox-hunt*
scripts.install:common-front: cd common-front/bin && npm run compile && cd ../..
scripts.start:fox-hunt-front: cd fox-hunt-front && npm run start:dev && cd ..
scripts.start:fox-hunt-organization-front: cd fox-hunt-organization-front && npm run start:dev && cd ..
scripts.start:fox-hunt-organization-backend: cd fox-hunt-organization-backend && npm run start:dev && cd ..
scripts.start:fox-hunt-feature-service: cd fox-hunt-feature-service && npm run start:dev && cd ..
scripts.start:fox-hunt-api-gateway: cd fox-hunt-api-gateway && npm run start:dev && cd ..
scripts.storybook:common-front: cd common-front/bin && npm run storybook && cd ../..
scripts.storybook:fox-hunt-organization-front: cd fox-hunt-organization-front && npm run storybook && cd ..
scripts.storybook:fox-hunt-front: cd fox-hunt-front && npm run storybook && cd ..
